data.name: Acme Platinum Card
data.description: Acme Bank rewards card. Help to get to your rewards faster.

features.additionalValue: Know what to pay when. Set up Autopay or SMS payment reminders so you can stay on top of your spend and repayments.

features.additionalInfo: For those who want everyday rewards, Earn rate on all eligible purchases:$1 = 1.25 points
For those who want Air travel rewards, as well as merchandise from the Airline store. Earn rate on all eligible purchases: $1 =1 points
Complimentary cover for overseas travel, extended warranty, purchase security transit accidents, subject to the terms and conditions set out in the Acme Credit Cards Complimentary Insurance Policy.

features.additionalValue: 24/7 personal concierge services - Dedicated Acme Concierge services are on-call 24/7.
features.additionalInfo: Dedicated Acme Concierge services are on-call 24/7 to fulfil your requests, from restaurant bookings and party planning, to tickets to your favourite game.

features.additionalValue: Uncapped rewards. The sky's the limit with no cap on earning points.
Use our repayment planner to break large purchases or balances down into regular instalments.

features.additionalInfo: The following is a summary only of some of  the benefits available under the Overseas travel insurance (Terms, conditions and exclusions apply.
The following is a summary only of the benefit available under the Transit accident insurance policy Terms, conditions and exclusions apply
Cover against loss, theft or accidental damage for a range of new personal items purchased in Australia and overseas using your. Terms, conditions and exclusions apply.
The following is a summary only of the benefit available under the Extended warranty insurance Terms, conditions and exclusions apply.
Acme Fraud Money Back Guarantee ensures that any unauthorised transaction claims will be reimbursed provided that the cardholder has not contributed to the loss and contacted us promptly.

features.additionalValue: Enjoy up to 2 complimentary passes to the Priority Pass or Airline Club lounges per year, depending on your program. See FAQs below for details on how to redeem your passes.

eligibility.additionalValue: Those with an Australian permanent residency and who are currently in Australia

fees.name: Annual Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $250 plus a separate $50 Airline Rewards Fee, charged annually (applicable only when the Platinum Airline rewards program is selected)

fees.name: Foreign transaction fee
fees.additionalValue: Payable as a percentage of the Australian dollar value of any foreign transaction.

fees.name: Cash Advance Fee
fees.additionalValue: If the card has a negative balance after the transaction: 2.0% or $2.50, whichever is higher (max. $150). If the card has a positive balance after the transaction: $2.50  These charges will appear on your statement directly below the relevant cash advance.

fees.name: Duplicate statement fee
fees.additionalInfo: $2.00 may be debited from your credit card account if you, or an additional cardholder, orders a copy of a statement that has already been issued for your account. This fee is debited from your account on or after the day you order the duplicate statement.

fees.name: Late payment fee
fees.additionalValue:
$15 each statement cycle that the minimum monthly payment is not paid by the statement due date.

If the card has a positive balance after the transaction: $2.50  

These charges will appear on your statement directly below the relevant cash advance. Applies for transactions in a foreign currency, or in Australian dollars but processed by an overseas merchant or financial institution.

fees.name: Airline Rewards Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies annually for customers who choose to earn Airline Points through the Platinum Airline rewards program.
